item.title: ||kabbo's place
item.summary: [A] note respecting sorcerers who assume the shape of birds or jackals, on p.4701 rev.). About '||khabbo's place' where sorcerers turn themselves into jackals if they want to kill people or birds, so as to fool people into thinking they are these animals.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book V-9
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)

keyword.subkw: become birds and jackals at ||kabbo's place
the sorcerers at his place become birds and jackals
